data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Beccacece, Hernan Mario (2017): A new species of the genus Bertholdia Schaus, 1896 (Lepidoptera: Erebidae: Arctiinae) from the Neotropical region: Bertholdia zoenia sp. n.
